utils

Class ImageColorsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.ImageColorsUtil

  • public class ImageColorsUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for making an Image in which a designated color is made transparent.
    Author:
    Faisal Feroz

      • makeColorTransparent

        public static java.awt.Image makeColorTransparent(java.awt.Image im,
                                  java.awt.Color color)
        This method makes the color in image transparent.
        Parameters:
        im - The image who's color needs to be made transparent.
        color - The color which needs to be filtered out of the image.
        Returns:
        Image from which the color has been removed.
